attributes.action: Significantly increase interest rates for savers in banks owned or partly owned by the government such as Northern Rock and RBS and their subsidieries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By so doing,savers,currently disadvantaged by low interest rates, would have a sound foundation for their savings and increase the capital investment of these financial institutions thus significantly increasing public and world-wide confidence.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Significantly increase interest rates for savers in banks owned or partly owned by the government such as Northern Rock and RBS and their subsidieries."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20165


Prime Minister's Office
